Description.Name: Letter of Marque: Pilot MiG
Description.Details: This Letter of Marque contracts a specific MechWarrior Pilot, MiG to your employ for the duration of the contract. Duration is variable for no less than 3 years and no greater than 5 years. Contract is voided upon death of pilot or if employer fires the pilot. Firing the pilot will prevent re-hiring until remaining contract duration has expired. This item is for pilot hiring only, it will not install in mechs
